mapper.insert: insert into USER (ID, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, PHONE_NUM) values (#{id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phone_num})
mapper.select: select SUBSCRIBE_YN from USER where ID="${ID}"

select USER_ID, ID, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE_NUM, SUBSCRIBE_YN, DELETE_YN, CREATE_DATE from USER where ID like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') NICKNAME like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') SUBSCRIBE_YN like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') DELETE_YN like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1 order by CREATE_DATE desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select count(USER_ID) from USER where ID like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') NICKNAME like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') SUBSCRIBE_YN like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') DELETE_YN like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1
mapper.update: update VISIT set NUMBER=NUMBER+1 where date_format(VISIT_DATE, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d')
